# Issue Templates

This folder contains Issue Templates made available to all TV 2 developers. To use these templates, visit "Issues > New issue" in your repo, where these templates will show up as options for creating new issues.

## Epic

The [Epic template](EPIC.yaml) is used to create large user stories that can be broken down into smaller tasks. It helps in organizing and managing significant features or projects.

## Feature

The [Feature template](FEATURE.yaml) is used to describe new features or enhancements to existing functionality. It provides a structured way to outline the requirements and expectations for the feature.

## Task

The [Task template](TASK.yaml) is used to create smaller, actionable items that need to be completed. It helps in breaking down work into manageable pieces and tracking progress.

## Bug

The [Bug template](BUG.yaml) is used to report issues or bugs in the codebase. It helps in tracking and resolving problems efficiently.
